mapper.select: SELECT A.PROVINCE AS province, A.CITY AS city, A.DISTRICT AS district, A.OPERATORNAME AS operatorname, B.CUSTOMERNAME AS customername, LEFT(CONCAT(C.SERIAL_NUMBER,''),11) AS serialNumber, D.PROD_NAME AS prodName, T.BUSI_ORDER_DATE AS busiOrderDate, T.BUSI_CELLNO AS busiCellno, T.pay_flag AS payFlag, ( CASE WHEN T.pay_flag=1 THEN '已签约' WHEN T.pay_flag=0 THEN '未签约' ELSE '未知' END ) payFlagName FROM busi_order T, account A, customer B, SERIAL C, prod D WHERE T.OPER_ID=A.OPERATORID AND T.CUSTID=B.CUSTID AND T.SERIAL_ID=C.SERIAL_ID AND T.PROD_ID=D.PROD_ID
SELECT b.district as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM busi_order a,account b WHERE a.oper_id=b.operatorid AND a.pay_flag=1 GROUP BY b.district;

SELECT * FROM ( (SELECT COUNT(*) AS notsign FROM busi_order WHERE pay_flag=0) a, -- 一个月内签约 14 (SELECT COUNT(*) AS monthsign FROM busi_order WHERE busi_order_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND NOW()) b, -- 一年以上签约 (SELECT COUNT(*) AS oneyearsign FROM busi_order WHERE busi_order_date < DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 12 MONTH) ) c, -- 三年以上签约 (SELECT COUNT(*) AS threeyearsign FROM busi_order WHERE busi_order_date < DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 36 MONTH)) d )

SELECT COUNT(*) as counts, `OPERATORID`, `OPERATORNAME`, `PROVINCE`, `CITY`, `DISTRICT`, `DEPARTMENT`, `CHANNEL`, `ROLE`, `passwd`, pic FROM busi_order
LEFT JOIN account ON oper_id = OPERATORID
GROUP BY oper_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT COUNT(*) AS value, `PROD_NAME` as name FROM busi_order a,prod b WHERE a.prod_id=b.prod_id GROUP BY a.prod_id,b.prod_id,b.prod_type,b.prod_name, b.combo_fee,b.promise_time,b.pre_pay_fee,b.des_pic ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT b.feature_type as featureType, b.feature_name as featureName, b.good_type as goodType, c.DISTRICT as district, COUNT(*) as counts, IF(b.`FEATURE_NAME`='发发发发',0,IF(b.`FEATURE_NAME`='六六六六',1,IF(b.`FEATURE_NAME`='我爱你',2,IF(b .`FEATURE_NAME`='一生一世',3,4)))) AS featureNumber FROM busi_order a,SERIAL b,account c WHERE a.serial_id=b.serial_id AND a.oper_id=c.operatorid GROUP BY b.feature_type,b.feature_name,b.good_type,c.DISTRICT ORDER BY c.DISTRICT
